content: Can we use EnrollmentRequest for Provider Enrollment? @Paul Knapp
@nicola (RIO/SS) The resource is really a stub, but if you'd like to come to Financial Management and help us define the use case and evolve the resource that would be appreciated.

Paul Knapp said:

nicola (RIO/SS) The resource is really a stub, but if you'd like to come to Financial Management and help us define the use case and evolve the resource that would be appreciated.

Hi @Paul Knapp I've been trying to get attention for the same exact requirement...Where things are at re broadening the scope of EnrollmentRequest? I'm happy to contribute/lead any work required for this in the WG.
